QueryResult.text: select odf_scenario_targets.id odf_pk, ODF_SCENARIO_TARGETS.ID as scenario_fact_key, ODF_SCENARIO_TARGETS.ID as clarity_scenario_fact_key, odf_scenario_targets.SCENARIO_ID as scenario_key, odf_scenario_targets.CODE as scenario_target_id, widgets.attribute_api_alias as attribute, odf_scenario_targets.VALUE as attribute_value, CASE WHEN widgets.target_type='target' THEN 'TARGET' ELSE 'GOAL' END as attribute_type, ODF_SCENARIO_TARGETS.CREATED_DATE as clarity_created_date, ODF_SCENARIO_TARGETS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as clarity_updated_date from odf_scenario_targets odf_scenario_targets JOIN odf_visual_widgets widgets ON odf_scenario_targets.code =widgets.code where 1 = 1
